general.title: General Settings

language.title: Language Settings
language.label: Select Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the application interface

debug.title: Debug Settings
debug.enableLoggingDescription: Enable detailed logging for debugging purposes

webUI.title: Web UI Settings
webUI.enableWebUIDescription: Enable web-based user interface for remote access
webUI.enableWebUIDescriptionDisabled: Cannot disable Web UI while accessing through web interface

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: Choose your preferred theme for the application interface

window.title: Window Management
window.refreshTitlesDescription: Refresh all window titles to reflect current state

general.optInDescription: Allow the app to check for and install beta and alpha releases

autoUpdate.title: Automatic Updates
autoUpdate.description: Automatically download and install updates when available
autoUpdate.notAvailableMacOS: Auto-update is not available on macOS. Updates must be downloaded manually.
autoUpdate.notAvailableWindows: Auto-update is not available on Windows. Updates must be downloaded manually.
autoUpdate.notAvailableOther: Auto-update is not available on this platform. Updates must be downloaded manually.

nonStable.title: Non-Stable Updates
nonStable.description: Allow the app to check for and install beta and alpha releases
nonStable.notAvailableWhenAutoUpdateDisabled: Non-stable updates are only available when auto-update is enabled.

releaseTypes.title: Release Types
releaseTypes.description: Select which types of releases to check for updates
releaseTypes.betaDescription: Beta releases are feature-complete but may have bugs
releaseTypes.alphaDescription: Alpha releases are early versions with experimental features
